section.title: Description
section.p: "Plan reviews are performed at periodic intervals to assess the overall consistency, appropriateness, completeness and effectiveness of the plan. The plan review includes comprehensive review of all the goals." - HL7 Care Plan Domain Analysis Model.

stentry.p: "Specifies optional comments for the review" - HL7 Care Plan Domain Analysis Model
"Specifies the date/time of the review" - HL7 Care Plan Domain Analysis Model
"Indicates the next scheduled review date" - HL7 Care Plan Domain Analysis Model
"Captures a text comment of the outcome review" - HL7 Care Plan Domain Analysis Model

This optional property describes the circumstances that triggered the review. The assumption is that this property would generally only be used to describe non-routine reasons why a review is/was required. Regularly scheduled reviews would not need to be indicated in this text. For example, a review might be indicated due to a change in the condition of the patient that causes a requirement to revise the care plan.
"Specifies a periodic frequency for future reviews" - HL7 Care Plan Domain Analysis Model
